SELECT SEQ_HIBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_HIBOARD ( HIBBS_SEQ, USER_ID, HIBBS_GROUP, HIBBS_ORDER, HIBBS_INDENT, HIBBS_TITLE, HIBBS_CONTENT, HIBBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{hiBbsSeq}, #{userId}, #{hiBbsGroup}, #{hiBbsOrder}, #{hiBbsIndent}, #{hiBbsTitle}, #{hiBbsContent}, 0, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT A.HIBBS_SEQ, NVL(A.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(B.USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(A.HIBBS_GROUP, 0) AS HIBBS_GROUP, NVL(A.HIBBS_ORDER, 0) AS HIBBS_ORDER, NVL(A.HIBBS_INDENT, 0) AS HIBBS_INDENT, NVL(A.HIBBS_TITLE, '') AS HIBBS_TITLE, NVL(A.HIBBS_CONTENT, '') AS HIBBS_CONTENT, NVL(A.HIBBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS HIBBS_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE FROM TBL_HIBOARD A, TBL_USER B WHERE A.HIBBS_SEQ = #{value} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_HIBOARD SET HIBBS_TITLE = #{hiBbsTitle}, HIBBS_CONTENT = #{hiBbsContent} WHERE HIBBS_SEQ = #{hiBbsSeq}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(A.HIBBS_SEQ) AS CNT FROM TBL_HIBOARD A, TBL_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
AND B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.HIBBS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.HIBBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0

SELECT HIBBS_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, HIBBS_GROUP, HIBBS_ORDER, HIBBS_INDENT, HIBBS_TITLE, HIBBS_CONTENT, HIBBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, HIBBS_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, HIBBS_GROUP, HIBBS_ORDER, HIBBS_INDENT, HIBBS_TITLE, HIBBS_CONTENT, HIBBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE FROM (SELECT A.HIBBS_SEQ, NVL(A.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(B.USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(A.HIBBS_GROUP, 0) AS HIBBS_GROUP, NVL(A.HIBBS_ORDER, 0) AS HIBBS_ORDER, NVL(A.HIBBS_INDENT, 0) AS HIBBS_INDENT, NVL(A.HIBBS_TITLE, '') AS HIBBS_TITLE, NVL(A.HIBBS_CONTENT, '') AS HIBBS_CONTENT, NVL(A.HIBBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS HIBBS_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE FROM TBL_HIBOARD A, TBL_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
AND B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.HIBBS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.HIBBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0
ORDER BY A.HIBBS_GROUP DESC, A.HIBBS_ORDER ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_HIBOARD_FILE ( HIBBS_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_NAME, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{hiBbsSeq}, 1, #{fileOrgName}, #{fileName}, #{fileExt}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT HIBBS_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, NVL(FILE_ORG_NAME, '') AS FILE_ORG_NAME, NVL(FILE_NAME, '') AS FILE_NAME, NVL(FILE_EXT, '') AS FILE_EXT, NVL(FILE_SIZE, 0) AS FILE_SIZE, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE FROM TBL_HIBOARD_FILE WHERE HIBBS_SEQ = #{value} AND FILE_SEQ = 1
